intro.item: Some people, like Petal, make money by trading. They buy something at a price. Then they sell it at a better price.
You are going to trade. You will buy pet fish. To make money, you will sell them.
Your ultimate goal is to buy a fizzer. You need to make enough money to do so. Try to find the trader who will sell you the fizzer. Get ready to meet the other traders and start trading online.
